# deliveredNotifications

**Instance Property**

An array of all user notifications delivered to the notification center.

## Declaration

```swift
var deliveredNotifications: [NSUserNotification] { get }
```

## Discussion

The number of notifications the user actually sees in the user interface may be less than the size of this array.

Note that these may or may not have been actually presented to the user. See the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserNotification/isPresented] property in the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserNotification] class.



## Managing the Delivered Notifications

- **deliver(_:)**: Deliver the specified user notification.
- **removeDeliveredNotification(_:)**: Remove a delivered user notification from the user notification center.
- **removeAllDeliveredNotifications()**: Remove all delivered user notifications from the user notification center.

items.description: Remove a delivered user notification from the user notification center.
items.name: removeDeliveredNotification(_:)

items.description: Remove all delivered user notifications from the user notification center.
